steps.name: Pull image from GHCR
steps.run: docker system prune -a --force && docker system prune -a --force && docker pull ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter:alpha
cd mega-linter-runner && ALPHAID=$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M') && npm version prerelease --preid="alpha$ALPHAID"

steps.name: Pull image from GHCR
steps.run: docker system prune -a --volumes --force && docker system prune -a --volumes --force && docker pull ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter:alpha
cd mega-linter-runner && ALPHAID=$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M') && npm version prerelease --preid="alpha$ALPHAID"
